comments.en:
Multi-function device: Printing, scanning, copying. For basic printing functionality use the HPIJS driver . For advanced functionality such as printer status, maintenance features, scanning and photo card unload use the HPLIP driver (which includes HPIJS).

Also known to work reasonably with the "cdj550" driver.

Probably also works well with the "pcl3" driver.

Known variants: Cse, Cxi; these differ by software bundle only.

Obsolete; HP suggests the OfficeJet G55.

Consumables/Refills: 2 cartridges: black, color
